ol.li: Explain how to find the image of T and the kernel of T.
Explain how to find a basis of the image of T and a basis of the kernel of T.
Explain how to find the rank and nullity of T, and why the rank-nullity theorem holds for T.

li.p: A basis of \mathrm{Im}\,T is {{image_basis}}. A basis of \mathrm{ker}\,T is {{kernel_basis}}.

The rank of T is {{rank}}, the nullity of T is {{nullity}}, and the dimension of the domain of T is {{columns}}. The rank-nullity theorem asserts that {{rank}}+{{nullity}}={{columns}}, which we see to be true.
